ComicInfo.Title: FrankenMoose Meets the Wolf Jug Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
Marmaduke "Moose" Mason is dead, having been executed by the Cooper clan after turning into a werewolf. Then who... or what... is FrankenMoose? Find out as Jughead the Hunger goes classic movie monster with "FrankenMoose Meets the Wolf Jug" Part 1!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Adam Gorham | 1 | B | Cover B | Thomas Pitilli | 2 | C | Cover C | Marguerite Sauvage | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-04 12:36:43. [CVDB688187]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Joe Eisma, Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy
ComicInfo.Inker: Joe Eisma, Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Adam Gorham, Marguerite Sauvage, Thomas Pitilli
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Segura, Jamie Lee Rotante, Stephen Oswald, Vincent Lovallo
ComicInfo.Characters: Archie Andrews, Betty Cooper, Jughead Jones, Kevin Keller, Moose Mason, Veronica Lodge
